meanings.definition: Mentally deranged or insane, especially under the influence of the moon.
meanings.sent1: The man appeared moonstruck, talking to imaginary friends in the park.
meanings.sent2: She felt moonstruck after staying up all night watching scary movies.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking cat made her feel moonstruck with laughter.
meanings.sent4: His wild theories left everyone feeling moonstruck by his madness.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house tour left her feeling truly moonstruck with fear.

meanings.definition: Affected by or as if by the moon; dreamy.
meanings.sent1: The painting had a moonstruck quality, with soft colors blending together.
meanings.sent2: She gazed at the stars, feeling moonstruck by the beauty of the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The romantic movie left her feeling moonstruck, dreaming of true love.
meanings.sent4: The music had a moonstruck effect, transporting listeners to a dreamy state.
meanings.sent5: The peaceful garden was a moonstruck paradise under the night sky.
